summary:
I tried to bring Ash Williams into Skyrim the best I could.
Took an hour and a lot of consulting to a friend, who is also a major Evil Dead fan, to get him to our liking.
Feel free to fix him as you wish but some credit would be nice ^-^.
descriptionHtml:
[b][center]﻿[/center][size=6]"Alright you Primitive Screwheads, listen up! This... Is my boomstick!"[/size]
[size=4][color=#999999]~This is my first file upload onto Nexus. As a suggestion by my friend, he wanted to see his favourite character brought into Skyrim!~
Disclaimer: I am no modder so I don't know how to bring the chainsaw arm or boomstick into Skyrim. I apologize.
Note: Feel free to fix the character to look more like Ashley or mod him into a follower, etc. Please give credit, is all I ask. uwu[/color]
[color=#ff0000]REQUIREMENTS:
[/color][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/]Brows - Standard Res[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]KS Hairdo's Renewal[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/]Better Males - Geonox Faces[/url]﻿ 
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/]Better Males - Nude - FavoredSoulMeshes - Flaccid

[color=#ff0000]UPDATE:
[/color][color=#999999]Preset is now available. [/color]
[/url]﻿
[/size][/b]
author: Ghostyspooks
